SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.controller

Class Control_Control

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.controller.Control_Control
public class Control_Control extends Object
The Control_Control class manages the control panel in the game. It is responsible for setting up UI elements such as images, buttons, and resizing them. It also manages the closing of the control panel and releasing resources when necessary.

    Clears the image of the given ImageView to release resources.
    private void
    closeControl()
    Closes the control panel by removing the blur effect from the main interface and removing the control pane from the main UI.
    void
    initialize()
    Initializes the control panel by setting up button hover sound effects, loading images, and adjusting the sizes of UI elements.
    private void
    loadImages()
    Loads the images for the control panel elements, such as the aircraft, bullets, heart, and ammo box.
    void
    releaseResources()
    Releases resources used by the images in the control panel by clearing their references.

    setElementSizes()
    Sets the size of the ImageViews for each control element.

    Sets the width and height for the given ImageView.
    void

    Sets the root container of the main interface, used to remove the blur effect when closing the control panel.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the control panel by setting up button hover sound effects, loading images, and adjusting the sizes of UI elements.

    • addHoverSoundToButton

      private void addHoverSoundToButton(javafx.scene.control.Button button)
      Adds a hover sound effect to the given button.
      Parameters:
      button - The button to which the hover sound will be added.

    • loadImages

      private void loadImages()
      Loads the images for the control panel elements, such as the aircraft, bullets, heart, and ammo box.

    • setElementSizes

      private void setElementSizes()
      Sets the size of the ImageViews for each control element.

    • setImageViewSize

      private void setImageViewSize(javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageView, double width, double height)
      Sets the width and height for the given ImageView.
      Parameters:
      imageView - The ImageView whose size will be set.
      width - The width to set.
      height - The height to set.

    • setMainRoot

      public void setMainRoot(javafx.scene.layout.Pane mainRoot)
      Sets the root container of the main interface, used to remove the blur effect when closing the control panel.
      Parameters:
      mainRoot - The root container of the main interface.

    • closeControl

      private void closeControl()
      Closes the control panel by removing the blur effect from the main interface and removing the control pane from the main UI.

    • releaseResources

      public void releaseResources()
      Releases resources used by the images in the control panel by clearing their references.

    • clearImageView

      private void clearImageView(javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageView)
      Clears the image of the given ImageView to release resources.
      Parameters:
      imageView - The ImageView whose image will be cleared.
